alert.note: Alert for Reynolds (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 07 at 11:47AM CST until March 09 at 4:17AM CST by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Missouri... Black River near Annapolis. River forecasts are based on observed precipitation and forecast precipitation for the next 48 hours. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO EARLY WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Black River near Annapolis. * WHEN...From this morning to early Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 9.0 feet, County Road 372 will begin flooding near this height. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:15 AM CST Monday the stage was 7.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 9.0 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage late this evening. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Thu Fri Sat Black River Annapolis 8.0 7.9 Mon 11 am 6.4 5.5 5.0 4.8 4.7 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Rainfall heavier than forecast could cause river levels to rise even higher than predicted. The NationalWeather Service will monitor this developing situation and issue follow up statements as conditions change. This product, along with additional weather and stream information, is available at https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=lsx.
